channel.title: Need help with admin/mod/staff
channel.description: how do you make sum one an admin mod or staff?

item.title: Need help with admin/mod/staff
item.dc:creator: @wileriz wileriz
item.description:
@wileriz wrote:

I go to my character folder and chose thant nick name what u need to make admin/mod/staff. Then search for “character-rights =” and i that line is number: 0 - normal player, 1 - mod, 2 - staff, 3 - admin. If there is 0 thane change it with number what u want. Then changed, go to data folder and search for files what names is: administrators, moderators, staff. Now if you chose number 3 (example) then what username write to administrator file, if number is 1 then to moderators file. I hope you understand.
P.S.My English is bad

[br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2007, 01:04:37 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Liam123, post:2, topic:111677”]Char folders - > Their name -> Player Rights. Change the 0 too; 1 for mod, 2 for admin, 3 for owner.[/quote]

Tou forgot one thing! You need coppy username to data folder and in right file like i said upper

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with admin/mod/staff
item.dc:creator: @Liam123 Liam123
item.description:
@Liam123 wrote:

Char folders - > Their name -> Player Rights. Change the 0 too; 1 for mod, 2 for admin, 3 for owner.

Read full topic
